title: Origin of the patients in Belgian hospitals (2020) : Classic hospitalization (Nederlandstalige versie)
description: This data shows the number of hospital stays per patient's place of residence, per age group and per gender in traditional and day hospitalization.
publisher: Federal Public Service Public Health, Food Chain Safety and Environment
